hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#list of other regions OTHER_REGIONS="us-west-1 us-east-1 eu-west-1 us-west-2 ap-southeast-1" #`aws ec2 describe-regions --query 'Regions[*].RegionName' --output text` check currentRegion="eu-central-1" ImageName=ovocAMI_${NEW_TAG}
echo "Regions And ids List" > output.txt echo -e "\r\n" >> output.txt #Get Image Id ImageId=$(aws ec2 describe-images --filters Name=name,Values=${ImageName}) #make The Image Public aws ec2 modify-image-attribute --image-id ${ImageId} --launch-permission "{\"Add\":[{\"Group\":\"all\"}]}" #get list of all the regions and copy the ami to all the regions for destRegionName in $OTHER_REGIONS do newRegionAmiId=$(aws ec2 copy-image --source-image-id ${ImageId} --source-region ${currentRegion} --region ${destRegionName} --name "ovocAmi_${destRegionName}") echo "Region Name: $destRegionName ," >> output.txt echo "Region id: $newRegionAmiId" >> output.txt echo -e "\r\n" >> output.txt done awsAccountID=$() #run the instance of the new image
#upload the Image to S3 (run it from the new instance) ec2-bundle-vol -d /mnt -k /root/PrivateKey.pem --cert /root/Certificate.pem -u $awsAccountID ec2-upload-bundle -b yourbucketname00404042009 -m /mnt/image.manifest.xml -a your_s3_access_key -s your_s3_secret_access_key #download the image from S3 to local directory
